pasugiya badada rathri 11.30 ta pamana kolambaa – nuwara margaye nuwara desata dhawanaya karamin thibu yathuru padiyak ana nothaka dhawanaya kirima hethuwen polisiya ema wedi praharaya ella kara thibuni.

mese abhiyogaya ella kale mangala samarawira, dilan perera, rajitha senarathna, manusha nanayakkara yana amathiwaruntath, wimal wirawansha, mahindananda aluthgamage yana manthriwarunta saha gewindu kumarathunga, dayan jayathilaka yana deshapalana wicharakayantaya.

pasukalina nadu wibhagayakadi minimarimata thath kirima yatathe ee.wijesuriya ha amaradasa rathnayaka chodana labu athara chodanawata waradakaru karanu laba siradaduwam niyama wiya.kese wethath katharagama pradeshaye "thrasthawadi" kriya madapawathwimata kala "sewaya" salaka pasuwa ee.wijesuriyage daduwama lihil karana ladi.

ee anuwa age pilithuru path wenama kawarayaka baha ewimatath, niyamitha kalayata wada paya bhagayak pilithuru liwima sadaha ayata laba dimatath, wishesha wibhaga adhikshana niladhariyaku ayata laba dimatath, bima padurak ela ee matha sita pilithuru liwimata awasthawa labadimatath wibhaga shaladhipathi wetha niyama karawa ganimata hakiwiya.
mama kohomath podi eka wage thamath..
eheth ohu boho duradiga kalpana kara ema thindu thirana aragath bawa ada me mohotha wana wita pasak wana sathyayayi.
maha lokuwata sama thana katha karanne api nathnam hatateta katta gahagannath ba..

eda aapu aaganthuka horu genapu kama jathi nisa dawasak parana panuyi samanuyi matath dunna.dawas ganakata passe hitapu badaginnata ee kama mata danune mage jiwitheta kapu hondama kama wela wage.unge kathawen mata theruna meyala karanne monawage wadada yana waga.me wadiye indala owune wagawa thiyena thanata payaka withara awidina durakin thiyenne.ethana thani rakinne sena kiyana kenak ekka thawath kenek.kale awata gamwala thiyena wagawanuth me wana sathungen parissam karanna bari eeke me dennek maha kalayak madde kohoma mura karannada?

me palu para kelawara wanne sohon pittaniyakini.

ee pilibanda hitapu purawidya adhyaksha janaral aacharya siran daraniyagala ha purawidya departhamenthuwe shila lekhana ha nanaka widya anshaye wadabalana adhyaksha namal kodithuwakku mahatha karunu dakwalamin sitiye meseya.

mage aanduwa wideshikayan ha wideshiya samagam lankawe idam miladi ganima sima karamin 2014 anka 38 darana idam (santhakaya pawarima sima kirime) panatha sammatha kala bawada, wathman aanduwa ee panawa thibu sima kirim 2017 anka 3 darana sanshodhana panathakin iwath kala bawada kawuruth mathaka thaba gatha yuthuya.

kawi bandimehi mana huruwak ladaru wiyehi di ma lada hethema puwathpath sangarawalata wiwidha wishayayan pilibanda lipi sapayimehidi chinthakayaku washayen prasiddha wiya. 1924 di kolambaa pamini ohu maligakande widyodaya piriwenata bandune, ehi di pali, sanskrutha bhasha hadara donald obesekara shishyathwaya laba gaththeya.

thintha wargawala adangu wiya yuthu uparima eeyam mattama nirnaya kara nithigatha karawima sandaha paribhogika aarakshana adhikariya saha thawath aya waga uththarakaruwan karamin 2011 pebarawari 14 wani dina parisara yukthi kendraya wisin gonu karana lada mulika ayithiwasikam pethsamin ayada athi paridi paribhogika aarakshana adhikariya wisin nawa gasat niwedanayak nikuth kara atha.pethsame ayada athi paridi anka 1725/30 saha 2011 sapthambar masa 30 wani dina darana rajaye athiwishesha gasat niwedanaya mangin thinthawala adangu wiya haki uparima eeyam pramanaya nirnaya karamin 2013 janawari 01 dina sita balapawathwena paridi paribhogika aarakshana adhikariya mangin mema niwedanaya nikuth kara atha.ee anuwa daruwange sellam bhanda sandaha bhawitha karana thintha wargawala saha bahira alankaranaya sandaha bhawitha karana imalshan thintha sandaha saha abhyanthara alankaranaya sandaha bhawitha karana imalshan thintha sandaha kilogram ekakata miligram 90ka uparima eeyam prathishathayak da inamal thintha saha gebima alankaranaya sandaha bhawitha karana thintha aalepana sandaha kilogram ekakata miligram 600ka uparima eeyam prathishathayak da mema gasat niwedanaya mangin regulasi gathakara atha.parisara yukthi kendraya saha toksikas link, digukal pawathina kabanika rasayanika drawya mulinuputa damime antharjathika jalaya (dhrthachw) samanga ekwa sidu karana lada “alankaranaya sandaha bhawitha karana thintha wargawala adangu eeyam sambandha antharjathika widyathmaka adhyayanayata anuwa ewakata pawathi gasat pathrayehi dakwa thibu uparima eeyam pramanaya wu 600 nanatha (kotas miliyanayakata thibiya haki eeyam anshu pramanaya) men 228 gunayak enam 137325 ka eeyam anshu pramanayak shri lankawen pariksha karana lada inamal thintha sampalayanhi anthargatha wu bawa soyaganna ladi.parisara yukthi kendraye widhayaka adhyaksha hemantha withanage mahatha prakasha karanne “mema gasat niwedanaya, alankaranaya pinisa aalepakara athi thintha wani drawyawala adangu wisha rasayanika drawya hethuwen niwasedi pasaledi wadabimedi ahithakara saukhya balapam walata lakwana paribhogikaya lada athiwishishta jayagrahanayak bawayi.”karthruta liyanna |
